segments.text: Ugh, that's just disgusting, all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that woman, she's just standing there, not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she doesn't even care about the mess she's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're just as bad, climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get hurt, and it's going to be a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand to look at it, it's just so... gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she's just drying those dishes like nothing's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone comes in and cleans up this mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just not right, the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of the most disgusting things I've seen in a while.
segments.speaker: PAR
